TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BufferedGraphics extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BufferedGraphics Implements IDisposable
public ref class BufferedGraphics sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 为双缓冲提供图形缓冲区。

span.span: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许您为图形实现自定义双缓冲。The class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics. 它为图形缓冲区提供包装器, 以及可用于写入缓冲区并将其内容呈现到输出设备的方法。It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device. 使用双缓冲的图形可以减少或消除因重绘显示图面而引起的闪烁。Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface. 使用双缓冲时, 更新的图形将首先绘制到内存中的缓冲区, 然后将此缓冲区的内容快速写入到部分或全部显示的图面。When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface. 所显示图形的这一相对短暂的覆盖通常会减少或消除在更新图形时有时会发生的闪烁。This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated. > [!NOTE] > 使用双缓冲的最简单方法是 使用方法在控件上设置控件样式标志。The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the control style flag on a control using the method. 设置控件标志会通过默认的图形缓冲区重定向控件的所有绘制, 而无需任何其他代码。Setting the flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code. 默认情况下, 此`true`标志设置为。This flag is set to `true` by default. 类没有公共构造函数, 并且必须使用其方法为应用程序域创建。 The class has no public constructor and must be created by the for an application domain using its method. 可以从静态属性中检索当前应用程序域的。You can retrieve the for the current application domain from the static property. 属性可用于绘制到图形缓冲区。The property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer. 此属性提供对对象的访问, 该对象绘制到为该对象分配的图形缓冲区。This property provides access to the object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this object. 不带参数的方法会将图形缓冲区的内容绘制到在分配缓冲区时指定的图面。The method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated. 使用方法的其他重载, 可以指定一个对象或对象, 该对象指向要将图形缓冲区内容绘制到的设备上下文。Other overloads of the method allow you to specify a object or an object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer. 有关绘制双缓冲图形的详细信息, 请参阅[双缓冲图形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md)。For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象通过多种类型的缓冲实现来绘制图形。The following code example demonstrates using a object to draw graphics using several types of buffering implementations. 再次单击窗体将启动和停止导致绘图更新的计时器。Clicking the form alternately starts and stops a timer that causes draw updates. 通过 "绘图更新", 可以观察双缓冲的效果。The draw updates allow you to observe the effect of double buffering. 右键单击窗体将循环切换为以下绘图模式:Right-clicking the form cycles through the following drawing modes: - 直接绘制到 的。Drawing directly to the for a . - 使用控件样式重写方法,以进行绘制。Drawing by overriding the method using the control style. - 通过在 不使用控件样式的情况下重写窗体方法的方法来进行绘制。Drawing by overriding the method for the form method without using the control style. 在每个模式下, 绘制的文本用于标识当前模式, 并描述按下鼠标按钮时发生的行为。In each mode, text is drawn that identifies the current mode and describes the behavior that occurs when each mouse button is pressed. [!code-cpp[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/CPP/bufferingtest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/CS/bufferingtest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/VB/bufferingtest.vb#1)]

span.span: The class is not thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 从不同的线程访问图形缓冲区时, 使用线程访问控制机制来防止冲突很重要。

span.span: When accessing a graphics buffer from separate threads, it is important to use a thread-access control mechanism to prevent conflicts.
Double Buffered Graphics

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完对象后调用 。Call when you are finished using the object. 方法使对象处于不可用状态。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. 调用后, 必须释放对对象的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器可以回收对象占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the object was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对对象的最后一个引用之前, 始终调用。Always call before you release your last reference to the object. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Double Buffered Graphics

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
